entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`uid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `type` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `data` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `isDefault` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_sanitizers_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_sanitizers_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`uid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isEnabled` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`uid`), FOREIGN KEY(`uid`) REFERENCES `sanitizers`(`uid`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

views.createSql: CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT sanitizers.uid AS uid, sanitizers.type AS type, sanitizers.name AS name, sanitizers.data AS data, sanitizers.description AS description, sanitizers.isDefault, sanitizer_configs.isEnabled AS isEnabled FROM sanitizers INNER JOIN sanitizer_configs ON sanitizers.uid = sanitizer_configs.uid

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
